issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: SetLoadBalancerPoliciesOfListener should distinguish missing parameters from empty list of parameters

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: When an empty list of policies is specified (-p ""), the tool should add PolicyNames to the request's parameter.
fields.summary: eulb-set-lb-policies-of-listener should always add PolicyNames in the request.

comments.body: Starting with commit {{432969e}}, both eulb-set-lb-policies-* commands should send empty {{PolicyNames}} parameters when they encounter empty policy lists.

[~spark]: This is the output I am currently getting while using the "eulb-set-lb-policies-of-listener". Looking at this, do you know if this a problem with euca2ools, services, or possible both? {code} [root@g-26-05 ~]# eulb-set-lb-policies-of-listener -l 80 -p "" test --debug 2014-05-22 15:17:30,372 DEBUG SetLoadBalancerPoliciesOfListener parsed arguments: {'security_token': None, 'url': None, 'region': None, 'LoadBalancerPort': 80, 'LoadBalancerName': 'test', 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None, 'PolicyNames.member': []} 2014-05-22 15:17:30,375 INFO SetLoadBalancerPoliciesOfListener parameters: {'Action': 'SetLoadBalancerPoliciesOfListener', 'PolicyNames': '', 'LoadBalancerPort': '80', 'Version': '2012-06-01', 'LoadBalancerName': 'test'} 2014-05-22 15:17:30,375 INFO ELB sending request (attempt 1 of 3) 2014-05-22 15:17:30,376 DEBUG QuerySigV2Auth string to sign: 'POST\n10.111.5.170:8773\n/services/LoadBalancing\nAWSAccessKeyId=AKIAYPPLLMKTWWNJNUJK&Action=SetLoadBalancerPoliciesOfListener&LoadBalancerName=test&LoadBalancerPort=80&PolicyNames=&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2014-05-22T22%3A17%3A30Z&Version=2012-06-01' 2014-05-22 15:17:30,376 DEBUG QuerySigV2Auth b64-encoded signature: lovuLwrJaHtniEZDl6WZnWdV0ojxmimxIyOeAny1koY= 2014-05-22 15:17:30,376 DEBUG QuerySigV2Auth converting params to POST data 2014-05-22 15:17:30,382 DEBUG ELB request method: POST 2014-05-22 15:17:30,382 DEBUG ELB request url: http://10.111.5.170:8773/services/LoadBalancing 2014-05-22 15:17:30,382 DEBUG ELB request header: Content-Length: 288 2014-05-22 15:17:30,382 DEBUG ELB request header: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded 2014-05-22 15:17:30,382 DEBUG ELB request header: Host: 10.111.5.170:8773 2014-05-22 15:17:30,382 DEBUG ELB request header: User-Agent: euca2ools/3.1.0-pre3-82-g6274212 (CPython 2.6.6; Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/bin/eulb-set-lb-policies-of-listener", line 6, in euca2ools.commands.elasticloadbalancing.setloadbalancerpoliciesoflistener.SetLoadBalancerPoliciesOfListener.run() File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 298, in run cmd.handle_cli_exception(err) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 295, in run result = cmd.main() File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 218, in main response = self.send() File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 180, in send return self.handle_server_error(err) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 167, in send auth=self.auth) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/service.py", line 193, in send_request self.handle_http_error(response) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/elasticloadbalancing/__init__.py", line 54, in handle_http_error raise AWSError(response) euca2ools.exceptions.AWSError: (500, 'Internal Server Error', 'InternalFailure', 'Internal Error.') {code}
[~ccassler], euca2ools behaviour looks good, presumably the service side of this will be addressed in EUCA-8329.
[~sjones]: Thanks Steve, I will close this bug.
